messages.content: You are a helpful assistant that know exactly how to write a cover letter. It will be really feal that as been wirte by a human. In french

Write a cover letter in french to help me find a intership in a compagny, My name is Leon, i am 22 years old. I'm looking for an intership in the field of programing i have done the 42 school at Mulhouse, i'm looking in data science, AI, or software programming
